00007 #ifndef MECAB_THREAD_H
00008 #define MECAB_THREAD_H
00009 
00010 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00011 #include "config.h"
00012 #endif
00013 
00014 #ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00015 #include <pthread.h>
00016 #else
00017 #ifdef _WIN32
00018 #include <windows.h>
00019 #include <process.h>
00020 #endif
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #if defined HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00024 #define MECAB_USE_THREAD 1
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #if (defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__))
00028 #define MECAB_USE_THREAD 1
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #define BEGINTHREAD(src, stack, func, arg, flag, id)                    \
00032   (HANDLE)_beginthreadex((void *)(src), (unsigned)(stack),              \
00033                          (unsigned(_stdcall *)(void *))(func), (void *)(arg), \
00034                          (unsigned)(flag), (unsigned *)(id))
00035 
00036 namespace MeCab {
00037 
00038 class thread {
00039  private:
00040 #ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00041   pthread_t hnd;
00042 #else
00043 #ifdef _WIN32
00044   HANDLE  hnd;
00045 #endif
00046 #endif
00047 
00048  public:
00049   static void* wrapper(void *ptr) {
00050     thread *p = static_cast<thread *>(ptr);
00051     p->run();
00052     return 0;
00053   }
00054 
00055   virtual void run() {}
00056 
00057   void start() {
00058 #ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00059     pthread_create(&hnd, 0, &thread::wrapper,
00060                    static_cast<void *>(this));
00061 
00062 #else
00063 #ifdef _WIN32
00064     DWORD id;
00065     hnd = BEGINTHREAD(0, 0, &thread::wrapper, this, 0, &id);
00066 #endif
00067 #endif
00068   }
00069 
00070   void join() {
00071 #ifdef HAVE_PTHREAD_H
00072     pthread_join(hnd, 0);
00073 #else
00074 #ifdef _WIN32
00075     WaitForSingleObject(hnd, INFINITE);
00076     CloseHandle(hnd);
00077 #endif
00078 #endif
00079   }
00080 
00081   virtual ~thread() {}
00082 };
00083 }
00084 #endif
